HiddenText.Name: How do I use Skype? How do I get it on my computer?
HiddenText.OpenningText: How do I use Skype? How do I get it on my computer?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Skype is a free software program you can download to your computer. Once you have downloaded it, you can use it to speak with people, either with audio only (like a telephone) or with video as well. Use this link to download Skype. If you need help, try using these tutorials from GSFlearnfree.
